suite.name: Suite of Web service addition tools
suite.description: This suite contains all the tools required to register Web services to Galaxy

tool.name: Step a: Enter the URL (WSDL/WADL location)
tool.description: This tool takes the URL of an external Web service. The URL should point to the description document of a Web service.

tool.name: Step b: Select desired Web Service Tools / Operations
tool.description: This tool lets the user choose operations from the Web service description document, as each operation has to be registered with Galaxy individually.

tool.name: Step c: Add tool(s) to Galaxy
tool.description: Adds tool to Galaxy and refreshes toolbox.
